Posts.Content: granny-56 wrote: Just getting ready to start chemo  I have to have 3 kinds. either AC X 4 cycles, TC X 4 cycles, an Al X 4, and or Taxol X 4.. What does all this mean...What will happen the first treatment..I go Monday (March, 1st 2010..) to have a port put in.. I am just terrified I have no idea what to expect..If you can tell me anything I would appreciate it. they did tell me it would take 2-3 hrs for the treatment.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo next week, granny-56 badger
